info.title: FortiSwitch Monitor
info.description: REST API for Monitor FortiSwitch objects and settings

local-port-used-sessions.description: Switch's 802.1x Status Local Port Used Sessions.

get.summary: Retrieve MC Lag List of Switch. for switch/mclag-list

enum: Local LAG is configured as static LAG.
Local LAG is configured as LACP passive.
Local LAG is configured as LACP active.
Local LAG is configured as forti-trunk.
Atleast one local LAG port is UP.
Misconfig please check peer and lacp configuration
Peer system id is used in LACP BPDU.
Peer LAG is configured as static LAG.
Peer LAG is configured as LACP passive.
Peer LAG is configured as LACP active
Peer LAG is configured as forti-trunk LAG.
Atleast one peer LAG port is UP, local LAG ports are filtered for ICL traffic.
All peer LAG ports are down, ICL traffic may be forwarded to local LAG port.
